author: Xerbutri
title: Potato flour factory  Agrodorp
intro: I visited this location in april 2007. My grandpa gave me a tip about the abandoned factories in this area. So after some research this factory turned up.
history: This factory was build in 1916. It is one of the last of these factories built in the Netherlands. In 1981 the factory was closed and it was abandoned since 1999. However when I visited the place in 2007 they were still moving machines from the factory.
